title: VENGEANCE ESSENTIAL HOUSE VOL.1
description:
VENGEANCE ESSENTIAL HOUSE VOL.1


After the release of ?Dance Ultra Voice Vol. 1?, Mutekki Media now follows up with ?Vengeance Essential House Vol. 1?, another layer of the successful Vengeance series. This house collection contains an archive of over 2500 self-contained samples, which create sound-fireworks in every production. From classic house loops over latin grooves to disco and big-room house, this CD covers almost anything the house-heart longs for. A must-have for house fans, but also an awesome repertory for sound-experimentalists. Pc- and Mac-users likewise benefit from this CD, because thanks to the use of the WAV-format, the appliance on both systems is possible, which allows to include the samples into established programs and samplers like Cubase (Halion), Logic (EXS), Reason, Ableton, Fruity Loops etc. The simple and clearly arranged structure (Loops, Drums, FX and hundreds of sample-fragments) allows the quick detection of the wanted sound (e.g.: The folder for ?soft kicks? contains samples for the ?smooth? house sound, the one for ?hard kicks? contains samples for the full, direct punch).
